tool_description: this api will return news regarding to climate change from diffrent sources.
name: Real time climate change news
title: Real time climate change news

api_list.name: Get individual NEws Source News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return news from  a specific news source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://real-time-climate-change-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "real-time-climate-change-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all major climate change news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the major climate change related news.
